pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data from all Seasons of Survivor (US) TV Series in Tidy Format // Datasets detailing the results, castaways, and events of each season of Survivor for the US, Australia, South Africa, New Zealand, and the UK. This includes details on the cast, voting history, immunity and reward challenges, jury votes, boot order, advantage details, and episode ratings. Use this for analysis of trends and statistics of the game.
